long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tabhive, your trusted Chrome extension, puts you in control of your open tabs. With Tabhive, managing your browsing experience has never been more straightforward.

Tabhive Highlights:

Tab Overview: Get a clear view of all your active tabs, thoughtfully organized for easy access.

Effortless Reordering: Arrange your tabs seamlessly by simply dragging and dropping.

Quick Navigation: Easily jump between tabs with a single click, improving your browsing efficiency.

Smart Search: Find specific tabs instantly using Tabhive's robust search feature.

Duplicate Tab Detection: Keep your browsing clean by identifying and closing duplicate tabs.
